channel.title: [317] HellFirePK {ALLSTAR} NEED STAFF! PK'ing and eco! Train today!
channel.description:
Hello and welcome to my rsps! Its revision 317 and here are some features!
Pkbox! Working pk at edgville home:/with shops! ::shops Where you can buy armor, rares, ect. ::donatorezone for donators of 3$ and up :D ::Still working on:: Pk box and tele tab. {emotes tab} 2 team pk'ing! And dung [Coming soon!] Webclient will come soon also :D
Pictures will be on the forums: HellFirepk.createaforum.com * you can also apply for staff on the forum page of the website!*
Link for client: http://uppit.com/ezuqn84vdqmk/Client_for_others.rar
Instructions on download: 1.Download (must have winrar with updated JRE and java!) 2. Put on desktop and open. 3. double click the @RUN file (must have latest version of java). 4. Click [enter] on the home screen then enter your username, hit [enter] then put in your password.
Credits:
Allstar: 90% for making the source. *Thanks for the source!* Gordonbandos: making the server and running the server.
Edgville pking command= ::home [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/341/m2x.png/][IMG]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/6421/m2x.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
Shops and rares command= ::shops [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/29/3kp.png/][IMG]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/8868/3kp.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
And dont forget skilling! command= emote tab= [skills button] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/835/6478.png/][IMG]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/8861/6478.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
And a awesome background for client! [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/708/h2ye.png/][IMG]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/4456/h2ye.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
